name: Hyper Knight
description:
The apocalypse began and ancient creatures emerged from their graves. You are people's only hope. Put on your armour and start fighting.

-Collect the souls of monsters and earn money.
-Find new weapons and armours.
-Discover your magical powers.
-Find a companion and it will accompany you.
-Save different towns, encounter unlimited enemies.
-Destroy the bosses that threaten the world.

Game Features:
-Easy, one-touch controls.
-Unlockable events.
-Simple upgrade system.
-Many different worlds.

Why are you waiting? Come on, grab your sword and join us.
